recipes.name: Lucknowi Biryani
steps: Marinate mutton in yogurt & spices for 2 hours
Par-boil basmati rice with whole spices
Layer mutton and rice in heavy pot
Add saffron milk and kewra water
Seal with dough and dum cook 45 min

recipes.name: Tunday Kabab
steps: Mix mince with papaya paste, rest 1 hour
Add khoya, cashew paste, and 160 spices
Shallow fry in ghee until golden
Serve with rumali roti and mint chutney

recipes.name: Aloo Puri
steps: Boil and mash potatoes with spices
Deep fry until puffed and golden

recipes.name: Petha
steps: Boil in sugar syrup with cardamom

recipes.name: Sarson Ka Saag
steps: Serve with makki di roti and white butter

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
Finish with cream and kasuri methi

recipes.name: Amritsari Kulcha
steps: Knead soft maida dough, rest 2 hours

recipes.name: Dal Makhani
steps: Simmer dal in gravy for 2 hours

recipes.name: Lassi
steps: Top with saffron strands and malai

recipes.name: Dal Baati Churma
steps: Knead stiff dough, shape into baatis
Make churma by crushing baati with ghee and jaggery

recipes.name: Laal Maas
steps: Fry whole mathania chilies in mustard oil
Add chili paste and slow cook 2 hours

recipes.name: Ghevar
steps: Make thin batter with flour, ghee, and ice water
Pour into hot ghee in circular mold
Garnish with rabri and dry fruits

recipes.name: Chole Bhature
steps: Cook with tea bag for dark color

recipes.name: Aloo Paratha
steps: Boil and mash potatoes with spices
Stuff potato filling in dough balls
Roll and cook on tawa with ghee

recipes.name: Pav Bhaji
steps: Mash on tawa to smooth paste
Toast pav with butter and serve

recipes.name: Vada Pav
steps: Place vada in pav and serve

recipes.name: Misal Pav
steps: Cook moth beans with spicy gravy

recipes.name: Dhokla
steps: Mix besan with yogurt and water
Add eno and pour into greased plate

recipes.name: Undhiyu
steps: Layer all vegetables in heavy pot
Mix gently and serve with puri

recipes.name: Khandvi
steps: Spread thin on back of thali

recipes.name: Masala Dosa
steps: Make crispy thin dosa on hot tawa

recipes.name: Mysore Pak
steps: Roast besan in ghee until aromatic
Pour into tray and cut when set

recipes.name: Idli Sambar
steps: Steam idlis in mold for 12 min
Add tamarind water and sambar powder
Temper with mustard and curry leaves
Serve idlis with hot sambar and coconut chutney

recipes.name: Chettinad Chicken
steps: Dry roast and grind Chettinad spices
Finish with curry leaves and coconut oil

recipes.name: Filter Coffee
steps: Pour hot water and let brew 15 min

recipes.name: Appam with Stew
steps: Make lacy appams in appa chatti
Cook vegetables in thin coconut milk
Add thick coconut milk at end

recipes.name: Kerala Fish Curry
steps: Grind coconut with chilies for paste
Boil with kokum and curry leaves

recipes.name: Payasam
steps: Roast vermicelli in ghee until golden
Garnish with fried cashews and raisins

recipes.name: Macher Jhol
steps: Marinate fish with turmeric and salt
Fry fish and potatoes in mustard oil

recipes.name: Rasgulla
steps: Cool in syrup and serve chilled

recipes.name: Kosha Mangsho
steps: Marinate mutton in yogurt and spices
Slow cook onions until deep brown
Cook covered on low heat 90 min

recipes.name: Dalma
steps: Temper with panch phoron in ghee

recipes.name: Pakhala Bhata
steps: Soak cooked rice in water overnight
Temper with mustard and curry leaves
Serve with fried fish or badi

recipes.name: Bajra Khichdi
steps: Soak bajra for a few hours
Cook with moong dal and water

recipes.name: Litti Chokha
steps: Make dough and sattu filling with spices
Bake over coal or in oven
Roast brinjal and mash for chokha
Dip litti in ghee and serve with chokha

recipes.name: Sattu Paratha
steps: Mix sattu with onion, chilies, spices

recipes.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
steps: Marinate meat in yogurt and spices
Add saffron milk and fried onions
Seal and dum cook for 45 min

recipes.name: Pesarattu
steps: Grind to smooth batter with ginger
Fold and serve with ginger chutney

recipes.name: Sakinalu
steps: Make rice flour dough with hot water

recipes.name: Jonna Rotte
steps: Knead jowar dough with hot water
Pat into flat rounds by hand

recipes.name: Fish Curry Rice
steps: Grind coconut with chilies for masala
Simmer 10 min and serve with rice

recipes.name: Bebinca
steps: Make batter with coconut milk and flour

recipes.name: Masor Tenga
steps: Fry fish lightly in mustard oil
Cook tomatoes with mustard and fenugreek

recipes.name: Dhuska
steps: Soak rice and dal, grind to batter

recipes.name: Chila
steps: Make thin batter with rice flour and dal

recipes.name: Bhutte Ka Kees
steps: Boil milk and add grated corn

recipes.name: Thukpa
steps: Prepare vegetable broth with garlic and ginger
Top with chili oil and green onion

recipes.name: Smoked Pork with Bamboo Shoot
steps: Boil bamboo shoot to remove bitterness
Cook pork with ginger and garlic
Add bamboo shoot and raja mircha

recipes.name: Jadoh
steps: Cook pork with turmeric and ginger
Add red rice and pork broth
